game_description: A classic snake game where the player controls a snake to eat food and grow longer while avoiding walls and the snake's own body.
core_mechanics: Control snake movement in four directions
Eat food to grow snake length and increase score
Avoid colliding with walls or snake's own body
Snake moves continuously at constant speed
Food spawns randomly on empty grid positions
controls: WASD keys as alternative movement controls
Touch swipe gestures for mobile devices
visual_style: Pixel art with clean geometric shapes and bright contrasting colors
key_characters: Snake (composed of head and body segments)
ui_elements: Game over screen with restart button
victory_defeat_conditions: Defeat: Snake collides with wall boundaries
Defeat: Snake collides with its own body

snake_body.png - Snake body segment sprite, 32x32 pixels, pixel art style, used for all body segments following the head
snake_tail.png - Snake tail segment sprite, 32x32 pixels, pixel art style, used for the final segment of the snake
food_apple.png - Red apple food item, 32x32 pixels, pixel art style, spawns randomly on grid for snake to consume
grid_background.png - Game board background with grid lines, repeatable tile pattern, dark background with lighter grid lines
